article.title: U.S. Army Modifies Common Missile Warning System Contract
article.text: BAE Systems, Nashua, New Hampshire, was awarded a $249,401,819 modification (P00029) to contract W58RGZ-13-D-0245 for the purchase of Common Missile Warning Systems and associated spare parts; and systems engineering, technical and logistics support services. Funding and work location will be determined with each order, with an estimated completion date of September 30, 2018. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
